text: Maguito Vilela (24 January 1949 - 13 January 2021) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He was Governor of Goiás from 1995 to 1998. He was also a member of the Brazilian Senate from 1999 to 2007. For a short time in January 2021, he was Mayor of Goiânia. Vilela died on 13 January 2021 in Goiânia from COVID-19, aged 71.Morre Maguito Vilela, prefeito eleito de Goiânia, aos 71 anos ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Brazilian mayors Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:People from Goiânia Category:Politicians from Goiás
title: Maguito Vilela
